      productName - - name of product object
      price - - current price which can be changed multiple times

    • decreaseQuantity

      public void decreaseQuantity(int delta)
      Decreases number of quantity of product. This method is used while ordering the product Throws exception if delta is greater than quantity which means customer cannot order this amount of products
      Parameters:
      delta - - integer number of how many products have been ordered

    • increaseQuantity

      public void increaseQuantity(int delta)
      This method is used during purchasing this type of products so after purchasing we should increase the quantity
      Parameters:
      delta - - integer number of quantity of products purchased
